name: places/ChIJ56KFiopYwokRQPNIctSuPbA
adrFormatAddress: 2040 Broadway, New York, NY 10023, USA

editorialSummary.text: High-end home-furniture chain, specializing in contemporary pieces from international designers.

originalText.text:
I just placed an order so I will follow up in a few months upon delivery, but up to this point Irina Alex spent SO much time helping me with several items until I made a decision. Then she devoted even more time assisting with fabric type and color selections. I wasn’t an easy customer and she was so kind and patient! Sandro Mardkha, the manager, was also honest and helpful the few times we met. The company offered the option of having their delivery service check to ensure the sizing of my new sofa wouldn’t be a problem with the elevator and corridors of my apartment building, which was very reassuring. I can’t say enough great things about the service I received at this store and from these two. I will report on my new sofa when delivered! Thanks Roche Bobois!!!
Sofa arrived and is gorgeous. When I had questions about something they responded immediately. I get a million compliments on this beautiful piece of furniture.

originalText.text:
We were looking for a new sofa and worked with Irina Alex. I really want to emphasize Irina’s work: we were hesitant about the color, Irina helped us with that, stopping by at our place and looking at the color scheme of the living room. She knew everything about the product, its fabric, etc. When we finally decided, she was indispensable providing all the details of the delivery process, helping to coordinate everything. It was really a full service (rarely happens nowadays). We are very happy with our sofa, and it’s a pleasure to think that if I need anything else, Irina will always help!
Thank you!

originalText.text:
Roche and the redo
We are so impressed with Roche Bobois' response to a problem. We had a frustrating experience at Roche regarding a long - very long - time for a chair delivery and what we considered subpar customer service. We have bought nearly all our furniture from Roche Bobois either in Paris or in the U.S. so this was surprising.
But then, with sincerity and kindness, Sandro Mardkha, manager at Roche Bobois' flagship store, made everything right again. He swooped in and took care of us in the most seamless and courteous way. Sometimes you judge a place by what they do when they make a mistake. Well, Roche triumphed and we are now more than ever huge fans!

originalText.text: Wonderful, welcoming store with beautiful products!  We worked primarily with Azi, who is incredibly knowledgeable, helpful, and responsive, but the rest of the staff are also great (shout out to Roch and Sandro).  We cannot say enough about how pleased we are with our experiences at the UWS store and the delivery process.

We worked primarily with Azi, who is incredibly knowledgeable, helpful, and responsive, but the rest of the staff are also great (shout out to Roch and Sandro).  We cannot say enough about how pleased we are with our experiences at the UWS store and the delivery process.

originalText.text: I’m in love with my gorgeous Roche Bobois rug, pillows & piece of art and I can’t wait for my custom made chair to arrive. I’m also very happy with the beautiful way I’ve been been taken care of by Roch & the others in the UWS showroom. It’s been a pleasure every step of the way!
